name: RPG Maker VX Data File
summary: Learn about .RVDATA files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: While developing a project, RVDATA files are stored in the /​Data/​ directory within the project directory. If the user compresses the game data into an executable for distribution, RVDATA files may be encrypted into .RGSS2A files to protect original content.

description: Game data file created by RPG Maker VX (RPGVX), a software development tool used to create role-playing games; may store various types of game data, including maps, items, character information, and enemies; used for saving development progress while creating an RPG.
